title: African Tales: A Barefoot Collection
description: Written by internationally acclaimed Xhosa storyteller, Gcina Mhlophe, and illustrated with hand-sewn artwork, each of these eight tales comes with an introduction to the country's customs and culture. The stories are from Ethiopia, Ghana, Lesotho, Malawi, Namibia, Senegal, Sudan and Swaziland.
author: Geina Mhlophe Gcina Mhlophe
